research:
Okay, I understand the task. I will act as a supply chain market intelligence researcher and identify 20 Swiss companies (or companies with a strong Swiss presence) within the specified industries and revenue range, excluding the listed companies exceeding $15B in revenue. I will then investigate each company for the four situations (Resource Constraints, Margin Pressure, Significant Growth, and Supply Chain Disruption) using the provided search queries, rules, and scoring logic. I will provide a structured research block for each company, including evidence with URLs and publication dates, and calculate the final scores and tier.

Before I begin, I need to generate a list of potential companies to research.

Based on the search results, here is a list of potential companies, keeping in mind the revenue range (USD 0.5B to 15B) and excluding Roche, Novartis, Nestlé, ABB, Zurich Insurance, Swiss Re, and UBS:

1.  Lindt & Sprüngli (Food & Beverage)
2.  Emmi AG (Food & Beverage)
3.  Bell Food Group (Food & Beverage)
4.  Aryzta AG (Food & Beverage)
5.  Hero Group (Food & Beverage)
6.  Sika AG (Chemicals)
7.  Schindler (Industrial Manufacturing)
8.  DKSH (FMCG & Consumer Goods)
9.  Barry Callebaut (Food & Beverage)
10. Coca-Cola HBC (Food & Beverage)
11. Sandoz (Pharmaceuticals)
12. ALSO (Technology)
13. Aptiv (Automotive Components)
14. Kühne + Nagel (Logistics)
15. Coop (Retail)
16. Migros (Retail)
17. Autoneum (Automotive Components)
18. Tetra Pak (Packaging)
19. Oetiker Group (Automotive Components)
20. Idorsia Pharmaceuticals (Pharmaceuticals)

Now I will start researching each company for the four situations.

---

COMPANY: Lindt & Sprüngli
HQ: Switzerland
INDUSTRY: Food & Beverage (Chocolate)
REVENUE: Approx. USD 6B (CHF 5.2B)

SITUATION 1 — RESOURCE CONSTRAINTS:
- Signal: High volume of SC/Proc vacancies without urgency keywords | Strength: MEDIUM | Score: +1
  Evidence: Lindt & Sprüngli's career page lists various job openings, including a "Customer Supply Chain Co-op - Winter 2025" and "Industrial Performance Director". While these listings indicate hiring activity, the lack of urgency keywords suggests a persistent need rather than a crisis.

  Date: 2026-02-26 | Source: Lindt & Sprüngli Careers | URL: https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQELLGi_vBUELHhHT5v9ZyG4s5PXLqKBsejkVhYUf5BkNqQxXjhe9KBYWCk3f_BLhJpOBHEWr-cq9HIHUzCr2hcJ9_dWC7OpRx5mfI3eDvWDqGBV1wQfMzeOQ5_JZgc7abxThdMtUADACJllHdP59cLWDAnf3xuSKEEJAA==
